title: Home Healthcare Admin
job_overview:
Job description
Yellowstone Local is a staffing and recruiting agency dedicated to supporting the skilled trades industry. We connect high-performing talent with growing home service companies across the U.S. Our clients—leaders in HVAC, plumbing, electrical services, and beyond—depend on skilled professionals to help drive their business growth. At Yellowstone Local, we take pride in matching the right people with the right opportunities, ensuring long-term success for both our clients and candidates.

Position Overview:
As the Administrative Manager for a home healthcare operation, you'll be the operational backbone behind the scenes—owning the intake process, ensuring accurate and timely documentation, and maintaining full compliance with ever-evolving Medicare/Medicaid and regulatory standards. This is a mission-critical role for someone who is well-versed in home healthcare and can operate independently in a fast-paced, high-accountability environment.

Key Responsibilities
Manage and oversee all administrative functions for a home healthcare agency operating in Miami, FL and Southern California
Handle intake workflows, patient onboarding, and document uploads on a strict timeline
Ensure compliance with Medicare, Medicaid, and home healthcare regulations
Monitor and enforce licensing requirements and regulatory deadlines
Maintain and manage documentation within EMR platform Datasoft Logic
Act as a compliance checkpoint to ensure accurate billing, regulatory documentation, and audit readiness
Work closely with executive leadership to uphold operational excellence and ensure long-term agency viability

Why Work With Yellowstone Local:
100% remote work setup with flexibility based on client needs
Be part of a growing team that supports top-tier brands in the skilled trades
Receive dedicated training and support from both Yellowstone Local and the client
Unlock long-term growth opportunities and stability based on your performance

What’s In It For You:
Full-time remote position (preferably based in the Philippines)
$4–$9/hour base rate (depending on experience)
Consistent 45-hour work week
Long-term opportunity with a high-retention team
Work with a mission-driven company in the healthcare space

Job requirements
Proven administrative experience in home healthcare (2+ years strongly preferred)
Deep understanding of Medicare/Medicaid regulations and compliance requirements
Experience managing documentation, patient onboarding, and care coordination
Proficiency with Datasoft Logic EMR system
High-level organizational and delegation skills
Ability to self-direct and work independently without constant supervision
Excellent English comprehension (written) Preferred
Experience working with California-based home health agencies
Familiarity with DOH-compliant documentation, including manuals and audits
Past leadership in home healthcare agency administration
